description: A lightweight fleece pullover that does just about everything except create a big impact on the environment, the Polartec® Microfleece HZ offers up go-anywhere warmth thanks to its 100% recycled fabric. The breathable Polartec® 100 fleece wicks moisture and provides soft, stretchy insulation whether it's under your rain shell in camp or over a T-shirt on a chilly day around the house.
name: Mountain Hardwear Polartec Microfleece 1/4 Zip - Mens
